select m.menuid, m.menuname, m.menuurl, m.menuno, m.menuparaid ,m.menucode,m.menuimgurl,m.create_time, case when m.menuparaid is not null then (select t.menuname from hj_menu t where t.menuid = m.menuparaid) end parentName, m.menutype from hj_menu m left join hj_role_menu rm on rm.menuid = m.menuid where 1=1 and m.dr = 0 and rm.dr = 0 and rm.roleid = (select u.roleid from hj_user u where 1=1 and u.dr = 0 and u.userid = #{userid})
